table.caption: Eiselcross Encounters: Levels 11–16
rows: An {@creature adult white dragon} confronts the characters, demanding treasure for passage through its territory. The dragon accepts 1,000 gp worth of treasure or a rare magic item as acceptable tribute.
The characters encounter an {@creature iron golem} that keeps walking in circles. The golem attacks any creatures within 10 feet of it but otherwise continues walking in circles.

The characters find a camp of {@dice 2d4} {@creature Minotaur||minotaurs} and {@dice 4d6} {@creature Orc||orcs} looking for wildfolk to recruit for the Kryn. These explorers want to keep their operation covert. If they aren't convinced the characters can keep their secret, the Xhorhasians attack.
A {@creature roc} flies overhead and attempts to scoop up a character of your choice as its next meal.

The characters encounter a coven of three {@creature Night Hag||night hags} searching for Aeorian items. In their humanoid guises, these hags pretend to be lost explorers and request the characters' escort. When the characters are in a vulnerable spot, the hags reveal their true nature and attack.
The characters are ambushed by {@dice 1d8 + 1} {@creature Frost Giant||frost giants}.
table.name: Eiselcross Encounters: Levels 11–16
